sentence: Good location cleanliness and attentive staff
Comfy beds great executive lounge for Honors members good enough shuttle system
The staff located it and sent it to me via FedEx overnight
Convenient location next to Laguardia Airport
Great Location GREAT Staff
Nice hotel great location next to LGA
I have enjoyed multiple stays at this location and I have been treated very well by the entire staff

Very convenient location across the freeway from LaGuardia shuttle service to and from the airport solid hotel restaurant and bar if you do not want to travel easy Uber ride to CitiField and US Open venues with all the construction going on at NYC airports and freeways it is good to be close when flying out in the AM
Convenient location to the airport great except for the road construction
We arrived at midnight and the hotel airport shuttle took forever to collect us
The hotel was in a location where parking was either super expensive or non existent
Gave advice on where to go and provided access to several forms of transportation
First I called from the airport to find out if they had any shuttle services since the hotel is less than half a mile away from the LaGuardia airport

I booked here due to close proximity to lga and they had a shuttle I spoke to hotel to confirm shuttle when booking called them before leaving home to reconfirm called again few hours before flight I was landing at 915pm and wanted to make sure I could get to hotel I was told each time to call hotel when I landed and had bags
Make sure you do not accidentally get on the shuttle for the Springfield by Mariot
Had to wait about 20 min for the shuttle and then a handful of us had to stand
When I did eventually get through I was given incorrect directions to the bus stop
There is a shuttle bus service to from the airport which runs most of the time although if you are coming from the airport you must wait in the arrivals area which I did not
Had hard time getting transportation
The location of this hotel is across the highway from Terminal C at LGA Airport so it is a short shuttle ride back and forth
Horrible shuttle driver
But that is expected in all location in that area
We had to take a bus to the number 7 train and that was a haul
